snippet: Maria Alyokhina had asked to be released temporarily so that she could be with her young son, but a judge in Siberia rejected the appeal.
abstract: Russian court rejects appeal by Maria Alyokhina, member of punk protest band Pussy Riot, for temporary release so that she can be with her 5-year-old son while he grows up.
lead_paragraph: Maria Alyokhina had asked to be released temporarily so that she could be with her young son, but a judge in Siberia rejected the appeal.

headline.seo: Russian Court Rejects Riot Band Member’s Request to Be With Young Son
headline.main: Russian Court Rejects Jailed Punk Band Member’s Request to Be With Young Son
headline.print_headline: Russian Court Rejects Band Member’s Request to Be With Son
